flawed_nl_solution:
In one week he drove 18+26+20+20+16 = <<18+26+20+20+16=1000>>1000 miles
He is reimbursed $0.36 per mile of travel, and he travels 1000 miles so he will receive 0.36*1000 = $<<0.36*1000=360>>360
#### 360

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 100, not 1000. It appears an extra zero was added to the number.
